table.name: vtiger_emailmarketing
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_emailmarketing` (`emailmarketingid` int(11) NOT NULL, `emailmarketingno` varchar(100) default NULL, `emailmarketing_tks_firstname` varchar(255) default NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`emailmarketingid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_emailmarketingcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_emailmarketingcf` (`emailmarketingid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`emailmarketingid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_emailmarketing_user_field
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_emailmarketing_user_field` (`recordid` int(25) NOT NULL, `userid` int(25) NOT NULL, `starred` varchar(100) default NULL , KEY (`vtiger_emailmarketing_user_field`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
